archiefmat.titel: Stukken betreffende het ontslag van A.A. Boers, registrator der slaven in Suriname en zijn vertrek uit die kolonie in 1830, met correspondentie van, aan, en over hem sedert 1819
archiefmat.titel_eng: Documents concerning the dismissal of A.A. Boers, registrar of the slaves in Suriname, and his departure from the colony in 1830, with correspondence to, from and concerning him since 1819
archiefmat.notes: The instruction for the registrar of the slaves was issued by decree of the Governor-General of 29 December 1828
